name: LibGDX August 2019 GameJam
description:
LibgGDX 2019 Game Jam

Theme: One Room

First Ever Game Jam Entry/First Ever Itch.io project published

You are a Slime, In a room. See how long you can last.

Still a work in progress, Will continue to modify and add things down the line.

Most Assets in this game were NOT created by me, I will credit them below.

Free Assets used:

Tileset: https://kronbits.itch.io/inca-game-assets

Slime: https://stealthix.itch.io/animated-slimes

Background Music: https://freesound.org/people/leehayeskerr/sounds/405444/

Download Jar and Run to play
